page.title: 07HOME LIFE, MY DIARY
page.content: SATURDAY 9TH. FEBRUARY 1985 TO TUESDAY 12TH. FEB. 1985. 9TH.FEB. I WENT TO THE TRAMPOLINE CLUB. MY GRAN' CAME TO WATCH ME. SHE SAID SHE ENJOYED WATCHING ME AND ALL THE OTHERS ON THE TRAMPOLINES. AFTER THAT, I WENT TO THE SWIMMING. I WENT WITH MY COUSIN KATHLEEN. SHE IS STAYING WITH ME AFTER SHE HAS HER TEA. 10TH.FEB. I WENT TO MASS AND THEN TO THE TRAMPOLINE CLUB. THE NAMES OF THE OTHER CHILDREN AT THE CLUB ARE MARGARET, SHARON, LOUISE, NATASHA, JANET, MORAG, STEVEN AND LINDSAY. 11TH. FEB AT SCHOOL OUR CLASS GOT A NEW GIRL FROM BISHOPBRIGGS.HER NAME IS GABRIELLE. I TOOK HER TO THE TOILET AND SHOWED HER WHERE TO PUT HER COAT.ANGELA AND I LOOKED AFTER GABRIELLE AT ALL THE PLAYTIMES. (NEXT PAGE)
